question: You would like to buy some electrical goods at a shop in a nearby town.  Write a letter to the shop and ask if they have the things you want or whether they will be able to order them. Ask what the prices are and how long they will be able to hold the goods for you. You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am Rotimi from a nearby town to you and I am writing to know if you have a portable printer and a calculator available in your store? I am specifically looking for the HP brand and model number 2330 for the printer; and any Casio brand for the calculator . If you don't have them available in the store now, can you help to order them and I will come to pick them up myself anytime during the week?

Furthermore, I would like to know how much each one of them costs so that I can come with the accurate cash for payment, I wouldn't want to be deprived of my goods because I have less than the total price of the goods.
Finally, I would also like to know how long you will be able to hold the goods for me till I show up for pick up.
I will be expecting  feedback on my queries and do have a lovely day ahead of you.
